channel.title: Need help with a few fixes client sided - Need developer for server!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Need help with dis shit, maybe some1 can help ? I can always return a favor, As I am the promotional editor of Soulsplit. I can provide people with good looking rsps promo's, so they can post that on youtube or anywere else..
[B]My problem: Blue hitmarks O_O & also wrong hitmark icons show up sometimes, Idk why Idk whatsup Idk client sided work :c Yes im new to programming so pls dont hate :c[/B] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/f255ad59f46a4f4864f51a181fe353bb.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center][b]Pls reply if you are interested in helping me ( I WILL HELP YOU WITH A PROMO ) Or just maybe post how I should fix this ? ( Really have no idea )
Skype: rafr200[/b][/center]

item.title: Need help with a few fixes client sided - Need developer for server!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

A hacky fix would be to just replace all of the hit markers with the correct ones in your cache (I’m assuming if you haven’t touched anything that the cache has the wrong ones by default anyways).

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few fixes client sided - Need developer for server!

did you downloaded it like how it is right now
or did you edit something
and can you give us a link to the post where you got the client from.
